title: Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates: Commercial exchange, international purchases and sales, market and specialization | Data México
description: Explore statistics on trade, international sales and purchases, market and specialization for Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates
text:
In 2022, the trade exchange (includes international purchases and sales) of Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates was US$398M.
In 2022, the states with the most international sales in Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates were
[Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave](/en/profile/geo/30) (US$86.4M), [Ciudad de México](/en/profile/geo/9) (US$84.5M), [Nuevo León](/en/profile/geo/19) (US$18.2M), [Jalisco](/en/profile/geo/14) (US$16.7M), and [Baja California](/en/profile/geo/2) (US$12M).
The states with the most international purchases in 2022 were
[Ciudad de México](/en/profile/geo/9) (US$95.7M), [Jalisco](/en/profile/geo/14) (US$37.9M), [Estado de México](/en/profile/geo/15) (US$7.6M), [Nuevo León](/en/profile/geo/19) (US$1.85M), and [Guanajuato](/en/profile/geo/11) (US$1.03M).
In 2022, the main commercial destinations of Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates were
[United States](/en/profile/country/usa) (US$142M), [Guatemala](/en/profile/country/gtm) (US$24.1M), [El Salvador](/en/profile/country/slv) (US$8.35M), [Poland](/en/profile/country/pol) (US$5.27M), and [Nicaragua](/en/profile/country/nic) (US$5.27M).
The main commercial origins of Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates in 2022 were
[United States](/en/profile/country/usa) (US$71.7M), [Colombia](/en/profile/country/col) (US$48M), [Malaysia](/en/profile/country/mys) (US$10.6M), [Germany](/en/profile/country/deu) (US$1.9M), and [China](/en/profile/country/chn) (US$1.88M).
In the global context, the main exporting countries of Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates in 2021 were
[Germany](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/deu) (US$866M), [Indonesia](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/idn) (US$621M), and [Brazil](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/bra) (US$592M). In the same year, the main importing countries of Extracts, Essences and Concentrates of Coffee, Tea or Maté and Preparations Based on these Products or Based on Coffee, Tea or Maté; Roasted Chicory and other Roasted Coffee Substitutes and Extracts, Essences and Concentrates were [United States](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/usa) (US$696M), [Philippines](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/phl) (US$598M), and [Germany](https://oec.world/en/profile/bilateral-product/42101/reporter/deu) (US$469M).
